subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: For Andy Roddick, James Blake and Patrick McEnroe, the opportunity to define their under-credentialed generation of American men’s tennis did not present itself like some slick marketing campaign.
snippet: For Andy Roddick, James Blake and Patrick McEnroe, the opportunity to define their under-credentialed generation of American men’s tennis did not present itself like some slick marketing campaign.
